const std::error_category&amp; future_category() noexcept;
}}

Obtains a reference to the static error category object for the errors related to futures and promises. The object is required to override the virtual function {{c|error_category::name()}} to return a pointer to the string {{c|"future"}}. It is used to identify error codes provided in the exceptions of type {{lc|std::future_error}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A reference to the static object of unspecified runtime type, derived from {{lc|std::error_category}}.
